amendment.description: To fully fund the No Child Left Behind Act for fiscal year 2005 and lower the national debt by closing tax loopholes.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2719 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 46 - 52. Record Vote Number: 35.

action.text: Amendment SA 2719 proposed by Senator Murray. (consideration: CR S2469-2492; text: CR S2469) To fully fund the No Child Left Behind Act for fiscal year 2005 and lower the national debt by closing tax loopholes.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 2719 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 46 - 52. Record Vote Number: 35.
Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 2719 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 46 - 52. Record Vote Number: 35.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2719 proposed by Senator Murray.
